general.name: mos_target_skies_v2
general.description: This table stores the positions used as blank sky regions for DR18 targetting. The sky regions are selected by dividing the sky in tiles of HEALpix nside 32. Each tile is then subdivided in candidate regions of HEALpix nside 32768 and the pixels that meet the isolation requirements are considered valid skies. This process is repeated for a number of all-sky catalogues. See <a href="https://sdss.org/dr18/targeting/fps/"> for further details on skies target selection.

surveys.name: BHM
surveys.description: An optical time-domain spectroscopic survey of quasars and X-ray sources

surveys.name: MWM
surveys.description: A time-domain, optical+IR spectroscopic survey of Milky Way stars of all types.

releases.name: DR18
releases.description: SDSS unreleased data.  Represents any work-in-progress data.

general.naming_convention: $MOS_TARGET/[V_TARG]/mos_target_skies_v2-[NUM].fits, where V_TARG=1.0.1 for DR18; and NUM = 1..1 to partition the file into parts

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

pix_32768.name: PIX_32768
pix_32768.description: The HEALpix pixel (nside=32768) of the sky region.

ra.name: RA
ra.description: The RA of the centre of the sky pixel.

dec.name: DEC
dec.description: The declination of the centre of the sky pixel.

down_pix.name: DOWN_PIX
down_pix.description: The HEALpix pixel (nside=256) of the sky region. Used internally to downsample the list of candidate region.

tile_32.name: TILE_32
tile_32.description: The HEALpix pixel (nside=32) of the sky region.

valid_gaia.name: VALID_GAIA
valid_gaia.description: Whether this is a valid sky region in the Gaia catalogue.

selected_gaia.name: SELECTED_GAIA
selected_gaia.description: Whether this sky region was selected in the Gaia catalogue.

mag_neighbour_gaia.name: MAG_NEIGHBOUR_GAIA
mag_neighbour_gaia.description: Magnitude of the nearest neighbour (G band).

valid_ls8.name: VALID_LS8
valid_ls8.description: Whether this is a valid sky region in the Legacy Survey DR18 catalogue.

selected_ls8.name: SELECTED_LS8
selected_ls8.description: Whether this sky region was selected in the Legacy Survey DR18 catalogue.

valid_ps1dr2.name: VALID_PS1DR2
valid_ps1dr2.description: Whether this is a valid sky region in the PanSTARRS DR2 catalogue.

selected_ps1dr2.name: SELECTED_PS1DR2
selected_ps1dr2.description: Whether this sky region was selected in the PanSTARRS DR2 catalogue.

valid_tmass.name: VALID_TMASS
valid_tmass.description: Whether this is a valid sky region in the 2MASS point source catalogue.

selected_tmass.name: SELECTED_TMASS
selected_tmass.description: Whether this sky region was selected in the 2MASS point source catalogue.

mag_neighbour_tmass.name: MAG_NEIGHBOUR_TMASS
mag_neighbour_tmass.description: Magnitude of the nearest neighbour (H band).

valid_tycho2.name: VALID_TYCHO2
valid_tycho2.description: Whether this is a valid sky region in the Tycho2 catalogue.

selected_tycho2.name: SELECTED_TYCHO2
selected_tycho2.description: Whether this sky region was selected in the Tycho2 catalogue.

mag_neighbour_tycho2.name: MAG_NEIGHBOUR_TYCHO2
mag_neighbour_tycho2.description: Magnitude of the nearest neighbour (Vt band).

valid_tmass_xsc.name: VALID_TMASS_XSC
valid_tmass_xsc.description: Whether this is a valid sky region in the 2MASS extended source catalogue.

selected_tmass_xsc.name: SELECTED_TMASS_XSC
selected_tmass_xsc.description: Whether this sky region was selected in the 2MASS extended source catalogue.
